Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Agent/Antigen/Vaccine Antigen/Mutated Ras Peptide/K-RAS ASP-12 Mutant Protein
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A mutant form of the p21-ras protein transcribed from a mutant form of the oncogene K-ras. K-Ras is located in the plasma membrane and transduces growth and differentiation signals from activated receptors to protein kinases within the cell. K-RAS ASP-12 contains a mutation at codon 12 and may be used in cancer immunotherapy. (NCI04)
